I don't fear transgenders. Not in the bathroom, not is the shower. I do not fear them here or there, I do not fear them anywhere. What I do fear is perverts posing as transgender given free access to places where females are in a state of undress. It is a violation of privacy and a danger.

Hope we still have a country in two more years. It is really scary how divided our country is. We do not need all the derision. Unfortunately our president has caused so much of it. There will always be different thinking, but the president and attorney general are sworn to uphold the laws of our country and they have failed. If they don't like the laws they should move to change them legally, not just ignore them.
Because the N word is not something a white person can reclaim. Look up the history of the word. White people have never been oppressed.
Police in France have the option of arming themselves or not. And yea, maybe if I had a gun, I'd still get killed by these murderer's, but I like my chances much more with a firearm than without.

He hasn't said he isn't going to either, nor have we even given him reasonable time to demonstrate so. The man isn't even President yet. I say, observe carefully to determine how his version of economics is going to pan out. Otherwise you'll be like the trader who sells his stock on a pin bar before it goes up up and up!
She should be miss Germany since that's where she was born lol
So sad

I agree. Ok, so we don't know her story... BUT... it's hard enough raising ONE child in today's economy with both parents in the home. Unless both of you have a good, stable, well paying career with enough for a rainy year in a savings account or a great life insurance policy, people should know better than to bring more kids into this world to suffer, starve or end up homeless. I have one child and am a single mother myself. There's absolutely no way I'm having any more kids until all of the monetary conditions above are met. It's super hard with one and unless she had been a twin or triplet there's no way I'd be ready for 2 more. You have to be stupid to not think everything through after the first child.

The bible would say that is true but I believe it can be delayed for years if our citizens are smart enough to put America first. If people will give Trump a chance we can delay the one world government.
